title: [Question] Where to report typos/errors found on the Universe site
body:
Quick question for you guys.  I spent a loooooot of time perusing the Universe today trying to sniff out any potential Darkins-in-waiting, and I came across a handful of typos and errors.  Where would we report something like that?  Somewhere on the Boards, via Ticket, or something else?  Most of them weren't anything big, just the sorts of things that need a quick tidying up.  Thanks for any help!

{{sticker:sona-playing}}

replies.body: Heya, your best bet would be to report it on our[ Bug Report boards](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).  We don't have a venue to send feedback on website errors, but QA might be able to field it.
Thanks so much!  I'll post them there as I encounter!
